title: Sellasia
description: An ancient fortified settlement located a few kilometers north of ancient Sparta on a hill known in modern times as Palaiogoulas, which is east of the modern town of Sellasia. Sacked several times in antiquity, Pausanias reports the settlement was abandoned by his time.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to cited descriptive information and GE historical imagery from 2013 which clearly shows the pattern of the ancient walls of the acropolis. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Κάστρο Σελλασίας
